description: Recently a new extension is added which allows you to launch a server with the list of security groups, but these security groups  doesn't show up in the Create server API and get server details response.
title: OSAPI create server and get server details response doesn't contain list of security groups

comments.content: Recently a new extension is added which allows you to launch a server with the list of security groups, but these security groups  doesn't show up in the Create server API and get server details response.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil
